title: Fireball
description: A powerful spell that deals 6 damage to target creature

title: Giant Growth
description: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn

title: Healing Salve
description: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn

title: Dark Ritual
description: Add BBB to your mana pool

title: Swords to Plowshares
description: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power

title: Wrath of God
description: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated

title: Black Lotus
description: Add three mana of any one color to your mana pool
